wikipedia_page.main: Roger Potter (born 13 May 1945) is a British bobsledder. He competed in the two man event at the 1980 Winter Olympics.

response: Roger Potter (October 5, 1907 – June 1982)Social Security Death Index: Roger Potter was an American basketball coach, who was the first coach for the National Basketball Association's Tri-Cities Blackhawks (now the Atlanta Hawks).  He lasted seven games (going 1-6) and was replaced with Red Auerbach.
